ai-anya-e1101n0:0_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-anya-e1101n0:4_0: of the Teacher, the go for refuge
ai-anya-e1101n0:5_0: like Brahmā, the hermitage of a gem,
ai-anya-e1101n0:6_0: With Saṅkheyyaka Mountain, the color of puppet,
ai-anya-e1101n0:7_0: and bows to the wheels of the Teaching.
ai-anya-e1101n0:11_0: if he one, when a gem is being recited;
ai-anya-e1101n0:12_0: and I always open the path,
ai-anya-e1101n0:14_0: purification of faculties, with purity of mind,
ai-anya-e1101n0:15_0: to those worthy of a religious donation,
ai-anya-e1101n0:17_0: I pay homage to the Saṅgha.
ai-anya-e1101n0:19_0: But someone who has attained the precious things,
ai-anya-e1101n0:20_0: Because of his good deeds, hard to realize,
ai-anya-e1101n0:24_0: There is a perfected one, with what is grave;
ai-anya-e1101n0:25_0: Putting them with fancy words and phrases.
ai-anya-e1101n0:28_0: So he doesn’t engage in the precepts.
ai-anya-e1101n0:31_0: Furthermore, the lovers of all activities,
ai-anya-e1101n0:32_0: I will plague, devoted, and listen.
ai-anya-e1101n0:34_0: For you say that the village is denigrating.
ai-anya-e1101n0:35_0: For this reason I applaud, the good one, and the champion.
